an1:1.1.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
an1:1.2.1: “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekarūpampi samanupassāmi yaṃ evaṃ purisassa cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhati yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, itthirūpaṃ.
an1:1.2.2: Itthirūpaṃ, bhikkhave, purisassa cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhatī”ti.
an1:2.1.1: “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekasaddampi samanupassāmi yaṃ evaṃ purisassa cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhati yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, itthisaddo.
an1:2.1.2: Itthisaddo, bhikkhave, purisassa cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhatī”ti.
an1:3.1.1: “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekagandhampi samanupassāmi yaṃ evaṃ purisassa cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhati yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, itthigandho.
an1:3.1.2: Itthigandho, bhikkhave, purisassa cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhatī”ti.
an1:4.1.1: “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekarasampi samanupassāmi yaṃ evaṃ purisassa cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhati yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, itthiraso.
an1:4.1.2: Itthiraso, bhikkhave, purisassa cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhatī”ti.
an1:5.1.1: “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekaphoṭṭhabbampi samanupassāmi yaṃ evaṃ purisassa cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhati yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, itthiphoṭṭhabbo.
an1:5.1.2: Itthiphoṭṭhabbo, bhikkhave, purisassa cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhatī”ti.
an1:6.1.1: “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekarūpampi samanupassāmi yaṃ evaṃ itthiyā cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhati yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, purisarūpaṃ.
an1:6.1.2: Purisarūpaṃ, bhikkhave, itthiyā cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhatī”ti.
an1:7.1.1: “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekasaddampi samanupassāmi yaṃ evaṃ itthiyā cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhati yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, purisasaddo.
an1:7.1.2: Purisasaddo, bhikkhave, itthiyā cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhatī”ti.
an1:8.1.1: “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekagandhampi samanupassāmi yaṃ evaṃ itthiyā cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhati yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, purisagandho.
an1:8.1.2: Purisagandho, bhikkhave, itthiyā cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhatī”ti.
an1:9.1.1: “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekarasampi samanupassāmi yaṃ evaṃ itthiyā cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhati yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, purisaraso.
an1:9.1.2: Purisaraso, bhikkhave, itthiyā cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhatī”ti.
an1:10.1.1: “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekaphoṭṭhabbampi samanupassāmi yaṃ evaṃ itthiyā cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhati yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, purisaphoṭṭhabbo.
an1:10.1.2: Purisaphoṭṭhabbo, bhikkhave, itthiyā cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhatī”ti.
an1:11.1.1: “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yena anuppanno vā kāmacchando uppajjati uppanno vā kāmacchando bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya saṃvattati yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, subhanimittaṃ.
an1:11.1.2: Subhanimittaṃ, bhikkhave, ayoniso manasi karoto anuppanno ceva kāmacchando uppajjati uppanno ca kāmacchando bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya saṃvattatī”ti.
an1:12.1.1: “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yena anuppanno vā byāpādo uppajjati uppanno vā byāpādo bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya saṃvattati yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, paṭighanimittaṃ.
an1:12.1.2: Paṭighanimittaṃ, bhikkhave, ayoniso manasi karoto anuppanno ceva byāpādo uppajjati uppanno ca byāpādo bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya saṃvattatī”ti.
an1:13.1.1: “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yena anuppannaṃ vā thinamiddhaṃ uppajjati uppannaṃ vā thinamiddhaṃ bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya saṃvattati yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, arati tandī vijambhitā bhattasammado cetaso ca līnattaṃ.
an1:13.1.2: Līnacittassa, bhikkhave, anuppannañceva thinamiddhaṃ uppajjati uppannañca thinamiddhaṃ bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya saṃvattatī”ti.
an1:14.1.1: “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yena anuppannaṃ vā uddhaccakukkuccaṃ uppajjati uppannaṃ vā uddhaccakukkuccaṃ bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya saṃvattati yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, cetaso avūpasamo.
an1:14.1.2: Avūpasantacittassa, bhikkhave, anuppannañceva uddhaccakukkuccaṃ uppajjati uppannañca uddhaccakukkuccaṃ bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya saṃvattatī”ti.
an1:15.1.1: “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yena anuppannā vā vicikicchā uppajjati uppannā vā vicikicchā bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya saṃvattati yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, ayonisomanasikāro.
an1:15.1.2: Ayoniso, bhikkhave, manasi karoto anuppannā ceva vicikicchā uppajjati uppannā ca vicikicchā bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya saṃvattatī”ti.
an1:16.1.1: “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yena anuppanno vā kāmacchando nuppajjati uppanno vā kāmacchando pahīyati yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, asubhanimittaṃ.
an1:16.1.2: Asubhanimittaṃ, bhikkhave, yoniso manasi karoto anuppanno ceva kāmacchando nuppajjati uppanno ca kāmacchando pahīyatī”ti.
an1:17.1.1: “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yena anuppanno vā byāpādo nuppajjati uppanno vā byāpādo pahīyati yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, mettā cetovimutti.
an1:17.1.2: Mettaṃ, bhikkhave, cetovimuttiṃ yoniso manasi karoto anuppanno ceva byāpādo nuppajjati uppanno ca byāpādo pahīyatī”ti.
an1:18.1.1: “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yena anuppannaṃ vā thinamiddhaṃ nuppajjati uppannaṃ vā thinamiddhaṃ pahīyati yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, ārambhadhātu nikkamadhātu parakkamadhātu.
an1:18.1.2: Āraddhavīriyassa, bhikkhave, anuppannañceva thinamiddhaṃ nuppajjati uppannañca thinamiddhaṃ pahīyatī”ti.
an1:19.1.1: “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yena anuppannaṃ vā uddhaccakukkuccaṃ nuppajjati uppannaṃ vā uddhaccakukkuccaṃ pahīyati yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, cetaso vūpasamo.
an1:19.1.2: Vūpasantacittassa, bhikkhave, anuppannañceva uddhaccakukkuccaṃ nuppajjati uppannañca uddhaccakukkuccaṃ pahīyatī”ti.
an1:20.1.1: “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yena anuppannā vā vicikicchā nuppajjati uppannā vā vicikicchā pahīyati yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, yonisomanasikāro.
an1:20.1.2: Yoniso, bhikkhave, manasi karoto anuppannā ceva vicikicchā nuppajjati uppannā ca vicikicchā pahīyatī”ti.
an1:21.1.1: “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yaṃ evaṃ abhāvitaṃ akammaniyaṃ hoti yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, cittaṃ.
an1:22.1.1: “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yaṃ evaṃ bhāvitaṃ kammaniyaṃ hoti yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, cittaṃ.
an1:23.1.1: “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yaṃ evaṃ abhāvitaṃ mahato anatthāya saṃvattati yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, cittaṃ.
an1:23.1.2: Cittaṃ, bhikkhave, abhāvitaṃ mahato anatthāya saṃvattatī”ti.
an1:24.1.1: “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yaṃ evaṃ bhāvitaṃ mahato atthāya saṃvattati yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, cittaṃ.
an1:24.1.2: Cittaṃ, bhikkhave, bhāvitaṃ mahato atthāya saṃvattatī”ti.
an1:25.1.1: “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yaṃ evaṃ abhāvitaṃ apātubhūtaṃ mahato anatthāya saṃvattati yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, cittaṃ.
an1:25.1.2: Cittaṃ, bhikkhave, abhāvitaṃ apātubhūtaṃ mahato anatthāya saṃvattatī”ti.
an1:26.1.1: “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yaṃ evaṃ bhāvitaṃ pātubhūtaṃ mahato atthāya saṃvattati yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, cittaṃ.
an1:26.1.2: Cittaṃ, bhikkhave, bhāvitaṃ pātubhūtaṃ mahato atthāya saṃvattatī”ti.
an1:27.1.1: “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yaṃ evaṃ abhāvitaṃ abahulīkataṃ mahato anatthāya saṃvattati yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, cittaṃ.
an1:27.1.2: Cittaṃ, bhikkhave, abhāvitaṃ abahulīkataṃ mahato anatthāya saṃvattatī”ti.
an1:28.1.1: “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yaṃ evaṃ bhāvitaṃ bahulīkataṃ mahato atthāya saṃvattati yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, cittaṃ.
an1:28.1.2: Cittaṃ, bhikkhave, bhāvitaṃ bahulīkataṃ mahato atthāya saṃvattatī”ti.
an1:29.1.1: “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yaṃ evaṃ abhāvitaṃ abahulīkataṃ dukkhādhivahaṃ hoti yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, cittaṃ.
an1:29.1.2: Cittaṃ, bhikkhave, abhāvitaṃ abahulīkataṃ dukkhādhivahaṃ hotī”ti.
an1:30.1.1: “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yaṃ evaṃ bhāvitaṃ bahulīkataṃ sukhādhivahaṃ hoti yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, cittaṃ.
an1:30.1.2: Cittaṃ, bhikkhave, bhāvitaṃ bahulīkataṃ sukhādhivahaṃ hotī”ti.
an1:31.1.1: “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yaṃ evaṃ adantaṃ mahato anatthāya saṃvattati yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, cittaṃ.
an1:31.1.2: Cittaṃ, bhikkhave, adantaṃ mahato anatthāya saṃvattatī”ti.
an1:32.1.1: “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yaṃ evaṃ dantaṃ mahato atthāya saṃvattati yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, cittaṃ.
an1:32.1.2: Cittaṃ, bhikkhave, dantaṃ mahato atthāya saṃvattatī”ti.
an1:33.1.1: “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yaṃ evaṃ aguttaṃ mahato anatthāya saṃvattati yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, cittaṃ.
an1:33.1.2: Cittaṃ, bhikkhave, aguttaṃ mahato anatthāya saṃvattatī”ti.
an1:34.1.1: “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yaṃ evaṃ guttaṃ mahato atthāya saṃvattati yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, cittaṃ.
an1:34.1.2: Cittaṃ, bhikkhave, guttaṃ mahato atthāya saṃvattatī”ti.
an1:35.1.1: “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yaṃ evaṃ arakkhitaṃ mahato anatthāya saṃvattati yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, cittaṃ.
an1:35.1.2: Cittaṃ, bhikkhave, arakkhitaṃ mahato anatthāya saṃvattatī”ti.
an1:36.1.1: “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yaṃ evaṃ rakkhitaṃ mahato atthāya saṃvattati yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, cittaṃ.
an1:36.1.2: Cittaṃ, bhikkhave, rakkhitaṃ mahato atthāya saṃvattatī”ti.
an1:37.1.1: “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yaṃ evaṃ asaṃvutaṃ mahato anatthāya saṃvattati yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, cittaṃ.
an1:37.1.2: Cittaṃ, bhikkhave, asaṃvutaṃ mahato anatthāya saṃvattatī”ti.
an1:38.1.1: “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yaṃ evaṃ saṃvutaṃ mahato atthāya saṃvattati yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, cittaṃ.
an1:38.1.2: Cittaṃ, bhikkhave, saṃvutaṃ mahato atthāya saṃvattatī”ti.
an1:39.1.1: “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yaṃ evaṃ adantaṃ aguttaṃ arakkhitaṃ asaṃvutaṃ mahato anatthāya saṃvattati yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, cittaṃ.
an1:39.1.2: Cittaṃ, bhikkhave, adantaṃ aguttaṃ arakkhitaṃ asaṃvutaṃ mahato anatthāya saṃvattatī”ti.
an1:40.1.1: “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yaṃ evaṃ dantaṃ guttaṃ rakkhitaṃ saṃvutaṃ mahato atthāya saṃvattati yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, cittaṃ.
an1:40.1.2: Cittaṃ, bhikkhave, dantaṃ guttaṃ rakkhitaṃ saṃvutaṃ mahato atthāya saṃvattatī”ti.
an1:41.1.1: “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, sālisūkaṃ vā yavasūkaṃ vā micchāpaṇihitaṃ hatthena vā pādena vā akkantaṃ hatthaṃ vā pādaṃ vā bhecchati lohitaṃ vā uppādessatīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati.
an1:41.1.4: Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, so vata bhikkhu micchāpaṇihitena cittena avijjaṃ bhecchati, vijjaṃ uppādessati, nibbānaṃ sacchikarissatīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati.
an1:42.1.1: “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, sālisūkaṃ vā yavasūkaṃ vā sammāpaṇihitaṃ hatthena vā pādena vā akkantaṃ hatthaṃ vā pādaṃ vā bhecchati lohitaṃ vā uppādessatīti ṭhānametaṃ vijjati.
an1:42.1.4: Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, so vata bhikkhu sammāpaṇihitena cittena avijjaṃ bhecchati, vijjaṃ uppādessati, nibbānaṃ sacchikarissatīti ṭhānametaṃ vijjati.
an1:43.1.1: “Idhāhaṃ, bhikkhave, ekaccaṃ puggalaṃ paduṭṭhacittaṃ evaṃ cetasā ceto paricca pajānāmi:
an1:43.1.2: ‘imamhi ce ayaṃ samaye puggalo kālaṃ kareyya, yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye’.
an1:43.1.5: Cetopadosahetu pana, bhikkhave, evam’idhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjantī”ti.
an1:44.1.1: “Idhāhaṃ, bhikkhave, ekaccaṃ puggalaṃ pasannacittaṃ evaṃ cetasā ceto paricca pajānāmi:
an1:44.1.2: ‘imamhi ce ayaṃ samaye puggalo kālaṃ kareyya, yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ sagge’.
an1:44.1.5: Cetopasādahetu pana, bhikkhave, evam’idhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjantī”ti.
an1:45.1.1: “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, udakarahado āvilo luḷito kalalībhūto tattha cakkhumā puriso tīre ṭhito na passeyya sippisambukampi sakkharakaṭhalampi macchagumbampi carantampi tiṭṭhantampi.
an1:45.1.4: Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, so vata bhikkhu āvilena cittena attatthaṃ vā ñassati paratthaṃ vā ñassati ubhayatthaṃ vā ñassati uttariṃ vā manussadhammā alamariyañāṇadassanavisesaṃ sacchikarissatīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati.
an1:46.1.1: “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, udakarahado accho vippasanno anāvilo tattha cakkhumā puriso tīre ṭhito passeyya sippisambukampi sakkharakaṭhalampi macchagumbampi carantampi tiṭṭhantampi.
an1:46.1.4: Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, so vata bhikkhu anāvilena cittena attatthaṃ vā ñassati paratthaṃ vā ñassati ubhayatthaṃ vā ñassati uttariṃ vā manussadhammā alamariyañāṇadassanavisesaṃ sacchikarissatīti ṭhānametaṃ vijjati.
an1:47.1.1: “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, yāni kānici rukkhajātānaṃ phandano tesaṃ aggamakkhāyati yadidaṃ mudutāya ceva kammaññatāya ca.
an1:47.1.2: Evamevaṃ kho ahaṃ, bhikkhave, nāññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yaṃ evaṃ bhāvitaṃ bahulīkataṃ mudu ca hoti kammaññañca yathayidaṃ cittaṃ.
an1:47.1.3: Cittaṃ, bhikkhave, bhāvitaṃ bahulīkataṃ mudu ca hoti kammaññañca hotī”ti.
an1:48.1.1: “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yaṃ evaṃ lahuparivattaṃ yathayidaṃ cittaṃ.
an1:48.1.2: Yāvañcidaṃ, bhikkhave, upamāpi na sukarā yāva lahuparivattaṃ cittan”ti.
an1:53.1.3: ‘bhikkhu arittajjhāno viharati satthusāsanakaro ovādapatikaro, amoghaṃ raṭṭhapiṇḍaṃ bhuñjati’.
an1:53.1.4: Ko pana vādo ye naṃ bahulīkarontī”ti.
an1:54.1.3: ‘bhikkhu arittajjhāno viharati satthusāsanakaro ovādapatikaro, amoghaṃ raṭṭhapiṇḍaṃ bhuñjati’.
an1:54.1.4: Ko pana vādo ye naṃ bahulīkarontī”ti.
an1:55.1.1: “Accharāsaṅghātamattampi ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu mettācittaṃ manasi karoti;
an1:55.1.3: ‘bhikkhu arittajjhāno viharati satthusāsanakaro ovādapatikaro amoghaṃ raṭṭhapiṇḍaṃ bhuñjati’.
an1:55.1.4: Ko pana vādo ye naṃ bahulīkarontī”ti.
an1:56.1.1: “Ye keci, bhikkhave, dhammā akusalā akusalabhāgiyā akusalapakkhikā, sabbe te manopubbaṅgamā.
an1:56.1.2: Mano tesaṃ dhammānaṃ paṭhamaṃ uppajjati, anvadeva akusalā dhammā”ti.
an1:57.1.1: “Ye keci, bhikkhave, dhammā kusalā kusalabhāgiyā kusalapakkhikā, sabbe te manopubbaṅgamā.
an1:57.1.2: Mano tesaṃ dhammānaṃ paṭhamaṃ uppajjati, anvadeva kusalā dhammā”ti.
an1:58.1.1: “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yena anuppannā vā akusalā dhammā uppajjanti uppannā vā kusalā dhammā parihāyanti yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, pamādo.
an1:58.1.2: Pamattassa, bhikkhave, anuppannā ceva akusalā dhammā uppajjanti uppannā ca kusalā dhammā parihāyantī”ti.
an1:59.1.1: “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yena anuppannā vā kusalā dhammā uppajjanti uppannā vā akusalā dhammā parihāyanti yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, appamādo.
an1:59.1.2: Appamattassa, bhikkhave, anuppannā ceva kusalā dhammā uppajjanti uppannā ca akusalā dhammā parihāyantī”ti.

an1:130.1.1: “Ye te, bhikkhave, bhikkhū adhammaṃ dhammoti dīpenti te, bhikkhave, bhikkhū bahujanaahitāya paṭipannā bahujanaasukhāya, bahuno janassa anatthāya ahitāya dukkhāya devamanussānaṃ.

an1:151.1.1: “Ye te, bhikkhave, bhikkhū āpattiṃ anāpattīti dīpenti te, bhikkhave, bhikkhū bahujanaahitāya paṭipannā bahujanaasukhāya, bahuno janassa anatthāya ahitāya dukkhāya devamanussānaṃ.
an1:151.1.2: Bahuñca te, bhikkhave, bhikkhū apuññaṃ pasavanti, te cimaṃ saddhammaṃ antaradhāpentī”ti.
an1:152-159.1.1: “Ye te, bhikkhave, bhikkhū lahukaṃ āpattiṃ garukā āpattīti dīpenti …pe… garukaṃ āpattiṃ lahukā āpattīti dīpenti …pe… duṭṭhullaṃ āpattiṃ aduṭṭhullā āpattīti dīpenti …pe… aduṭṭhullaṃ āpattiṃ duṭṭhullā āpattīti dīpenti …pe… sāvasesaṃ āpattiṃ anavasesā āpattīti dīpenti …pe… anavasesaṃ āpattiṃ sāvasesā āpattīti dīpenti …pe… sappaṭikammaṃ āpattiṃ appaṭikammā āpattīti dīpenti …pe… appaṭikammaṃ āpattiṃ sappaṭikammā āpattīti dīpenti te, bhikkhave, bhikkhū bahujanaahitāya paṭipannā bahujanaasukhāya, bahuno janassa anatthāya ahitāya dukkhāya devamanussānaṃ.
an1:152-159.1.2: Bahuñca te, bhikkhave, bhikkhū apuññaṃ pasavanti, te cimaṃ saddhammaṃ antaradhāpentī”ti.
an1:160.1.1: “Ye te, bhikkhave, bhikkhū anāpattiṃ anāpattīti dīpenti te, bhikkhave, bhikkhū bahujanahitāya paṭipannā bahujanasukhāya, bahuno janassa atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṃ.
an1:160.1.2: Bahuñca te, bhikkhave, bhikkhū puññaṃ pasavanti, te cimaṃ saddhammaṃ ṭhapentī”ti.
an1:161.1.1: “Ye te, bhikkhave, bhikkhū āpattiṃ āpattīti dīpenti te, bhikkhave, bhikkhū bahujanahitāya paṭipannā bahujanasukhāya, bahuno janassa atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṃ.
an1:161.1.2: Bahuñca te, bhikkhave, bhikkhū puññaṃ pasavanti, te cimaṃ saddhammaṃ ṭhapentī”ti.
an1:162-169.1.1: “Ye te, bhikkhave, bhikkhū lahukaṃ āpattiṃ lahukā āpattīti dīpenti … garukaṃ āpattiṃ garukā āpattīti dīpenti … duṭṭhullaṃ āpattiṃ duṭṭhullā āpattīti dīpenti … aduṭṭhullaṃ āpattiṃ aduṭṭhullā āpattīti dīpenti … sāvasesaṃ āpattiṃ sāvasesā āpattīti dīpenti … anavasesaṃ āpattiṃ anavasesā āpattīti dīpenti … sappaṭikammaṃ āpattiṃ sappaṭikammā āpattīti dīpenti … appaṭikammaṃ āpattiṃ appaṭikammā āpattīti dīpenti;
an1:162-169.1.2: te, bhikkhave, bhikkhū bahujanahitāya paṭipannā bahujanasukhāya, bahuno janassa atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṃ.
an1:162-169.1.3: Bahuñca te, bhikkhave, bhikkhū puññaṃ pasavanti, te cimaṃ saddhammaṃ ṭhapentī”ti.
an1:170.1.1: “Ekapuggalo, bhikkhave, loke uppajjamāno uppajjati bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāya atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṃ.
an1:170.1.4: Ayaṃ kho, bhikkhave, ekapuggalo loke uppajjamāno uppajjati bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāya atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānan”ti.
an1:171.1.4: Imassa kho, bhikkhave, ekapuggalassa pātubhāvo dullabho lokasmin”ti.
an1:172.1.4: Ayaṃ kho, bhikkhave, ekapuggalo loke uppajjamāno uppajjati acchariyamanusso”ti.
an1:173.1.1: “Ekapuggalassa, bhikkhave, kālakiriyā bahuno janassa anutappā hoti.
an1:173.1.4: Imassa kho, bhikkhave, ekapuggalassa kālakiriyā bahuno janassa anutappā hotī”ti.
an1:174.1.1: “Ekapuggalo, bhikkhave, loke uppajjamāno uppajjati adutiyo asahāyo appaṭimo appaṭisamo appaṭibhāgo appaṭipuggalo asamo asamasamo dvipadānaṃ aggo.
an1:174.1.4: Ayaṃ kho, bhikkhave, ekapuggalo loke uppajjamāno uppajjati adutiyo asahāyo appaṭimo appaṭisamo appaṭibhāgo appaṭipuggalo asamo asamasamo dvipadānaṃ aggo”ti.
an1:175-186.1.1: “Ekapuggalassa, bhikkhave, pātubhāvā mahato cakkhussa pātubhāvo hoti, mahato ālokassa pātubhāvo hoti, mahato obhāsassa pātubhāvo hoti, channaṃ anuttariyānaṃ pātubhāvo hoti, catunnaṃ paṭisambhidānaṃ sacchikiriyā hoti, anekadhātupaṭivedho hoti, nānādhātupaṭivedho hoti, vijjāvimuttiphalasacchikiriyā hoti, sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyā hoti, sakadāgāmiphalasacchikiriyā hoti, anāgāmiphalasacchikiriyā hoti, arahattaphalasacchikiriyā hoti.
an1:175-186.1.4: Imassa kho, bhikkhave, ekapuggalassa pātubhāvā mahato cakkhussa pātubhāvo hoti, mahato ālokassa pātubhāvo hoti, mahato obhāsassa pātubhāvo hoti, channaṃ anuttariyānaṃ pātubhāvo hoti, catunnaṃ paṭisambhidānaṃ sacchikiriyā hoti, anekadhātupaṭivedho hoti, nānādhātupaṭivedho hoti, vijjāvimuttiphalasacchikiriyā hoti, sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyā hoti, sakadāgāmiphalasacchikiriyā hoti, anāgāmiphalasacchikiriyā hoti, arahattaphalasacchikiriyā hotī”ti.
an1:187.1.1: “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekapuggalampi samanupassāmi yo evaṃ tathāgatena anuttaraṃ dhammacakkaṃ pavattitaṃ sammadeva anuppavatteti yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, sāriputto.
an1:187.1.2: Sāriputto, bhikkhave, tathāgatena anuttaraṃ dhammacakkaṃ pavattitaṃ sammadeva anuppavattetī”ti.
an1:188.1.1: “Etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ rattaññūnaṃ yadidaṃ aññāsikoṇḍañño. (1)
an1:197.1.1: … Saṅkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthaṃ vibhajantānaṃ yadidaṃ mahākaccāno”ti. (10)
an1:198.1.1: “Etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ manomayaṃ kāyaṃ abhinimminantānaṃ yadidaṃ cūḷapanthako. (1)
an1:209.1.1: “Etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhākāmānaṃ yadidaṃ rāhulo. (1)
an1:219.1.1: “Etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ bahussutānaṃ yadidaṃ ānando. (1)
an1:235.1.1: “Etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvikānaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ rattaññūnaṃ yadidaṃ mahāpajāpatigotamī. (1)
an1:248.1.1: “Etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ upāsakānaṃ paṭhamaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchantānaṃ yadidaṃ tapussabhallikā vāṇijā. (1)
an1:251.1.1: … Catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi parisaṃ saṅgaṇhantānaṃ yadidaṃ hatthako āḷavako. (4)
an1:258.1.1: “Etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvikānaṃ upāsikānaṃ paṭhamaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchantīnaṃ yadidaṃ sujātā seniyadhītā. (1)
an1:268.1.1: “Aṭṭhānametaṃ, bhikkhave, anavakāso yaṃ diṭṭhisampanno puggalo kañci saṅkhāraṃ niccato upagaccheyya. Netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati.
an1:268.1.2: Ṭhānañca kho etaṃ, bhikkhave, vijjati yaṃ puthujjano kañci saṅkhāraṃ niccato upagaccheyya. Ṭhānametaṃ vijjatī”ti.
an1:269.1.1: “Aṭṭhānametaṃ, bhikkhave, anavakāso yaṃ diṭṭhisampanno puggalo kañci saṅkhāraṃ sukhato upagaccheyya. Netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati.
an1:269.1.2: Ṭhānañca kho etaṃ, bhikkhave, vijjati yaṃ puthujjano kañci saṅkhāraṃ sukhato upagaccheyya. Ṭhānametaṃ vijjatī”ti.
an1:270.1.1: “Aṭṭhānametaṃ, bhikkhave, anavakāso yaṃ diṭṭhisampanno puggalo kañci dhammaṃ attato upagaccheyya. Netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati.
an1:270.1.2: Ṭhānañca kho etaṃ, bhikkhave, vijjati yaṃ puthujjano kañci dhammaṃ attato upagaccheyya. Ṭhānametaṃ vijjatī”ti.
an1:271.1.1: “Aṭṭhānametaṃ, bhikkhave, anavakāso yaṃ diṭṭhisampanno puggalo mātaraṃ jīvitā voropeyya. Netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati.
an1:271.1.2: Ṭhānañca kho, bhikkhave, vijjati yaṃ puthujjano mātaraṃ jīvitā voropeyya. Ṭhānametaṃ vijjatī”ti.
an1:272.1.1: “Aṭṭhānametaṃ, bhikkhave, anavakāso yaṃ diṭṭhisampanno puggalo pitaraṃ jīvitā voropeyya. Netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati.
an1:272.1.2: Ṭhānañca kho etaṃ, bhikkhave, vijjati yaṃ puthujjano pitaraṃ jīvitā voropeyya. Ṭhānametaṃ vijjatī”ti.
an1:273.1.1: “Aṭṭhānametaṃ, bhikkhave, anavakāso yaṃ diṭṭhisampanno puggalo arahantaṃ jīvitā voropeyya. Netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati.
an1:273.1.2: Ṭhānañca kho etaṃ, bhikkhave, vijjati yaṃ puthujjano arahantaṃ jīvitā voropeyya. Ṭhānametaṃ vijjatī”ti.
an1:274.1.1: “Aṭṭhānametaṃ, bhikkhave, anavakāso yaṃ diṭṭhisampanno puggalo tathāgatassa paduṭṭhacitto lohitaṃ uppādeyya. Netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati.
an1:274.1.2: Ṭhānañca kho etaṃ, bhikkhave, vijjati yaṃ puthujjano tathāgatassa paduṭṭhacitto lohitaṃ uppādeyya. Ṭhānametaṃ vijjatī”ti.
an1:275.1.1: “Aṭṭhānametaṃ, bhikkhave, anavakāso yaṃ diṭṭhisampanno puggalo saṅghaṃ bhindeyya. Netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati.
an1:275.1.2: Ṭhānañca kho etaṃ, bhikkhave, vijjati yaṃ puthujjano saṅghaṃ bhindeyya. Ṭhānametaṃ vijjatī”ti.
an1:276.1.1: “Aṭṭhānametaṃ, bhikkhave, anavakāso yaṃ diṭṭhisampanno puggalo aññaṃ satthāraṃ uddiseyya. Netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati.
an1:276.1.2: Ṭhānañca kho etaṃ, bhikkhave, vijjati yaṃ puthujjano aññaṃ satthāraṃ uddiseyya. Ṭhānametaṃ vijjatī”ti.
an1:277.1.1: “Aṭṭhānametaṃ, bhikkhave, anavakāso yaṃ ekissā lokadhātuyā dve arahanto sammāsambuddhā apubbaṃ acarimaṃ uppajjeyyuṃ. Netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati.
an1:277.1.2: Ṭhānañca kho etaṃ, bhikkhave, vijjati yaṃ ekissā lokadhātuyā ekova arahaṃ sammāsambuddho uppajjeyya. Ṭhānametaṃ vijjatī”ti.
an1:278.1.1: “Aṭṭhānametaṃ, bhikkhave, anavakāso yaṃ ekissā lokadhātuyā dve rājāno cakkavattī apubbaṃ acarimaṃ uppajjeyyuṃ. Netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati.
an1:278.1.2: Ṭhānañca kho etaṃ, bhikkhave, vijjati yaṃ ekissā lokadhātuyā eko rājā cakkavattī uppajjeyya. Ṭhānametaṃ vijjatī”ti.
an1:279.1.1: “Aṭṭhānametaṃ, bhikkhave, anavakāso yaṃ itthī arahaṃ assa sammāsambuddho. Netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati.
an1:279.1.2: Ṭhānañca kho, etaṃ, bhikkhave, vijjati yaṃ puriso arahaṃ assa sammāsambuddho. Ṭhānametaṃ vijjatī”ti.
an1:280.1.1: “Aṭṭhānametaṃ, bhikkhave, anavakāso yaṃ itthī rājā assa cakkavattī. Netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati.
an1:280.1.2: Ṭhānañca kho etaṃ, bhikkhave, vijjati yaṃ puriso rājā assa cakkavattī. Ṭhānametaṃ vijjatī”ti.
an1:281-283.1.1: “Aṭṭhānametaṃ, bhikkhave, anavakāso yaṃ itthī sakkattaṃ kāreyya …pe… mārattaṃ kāreyya …pe… brahmattaṃ kāreyya. Netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati.
an1:281-283.1.2: Ṭhānañca kho etaṃ, bhikkhave, vijjati yaṃ puriso sakkattaṃ kāreyya …pe… mārattaṃ kāreyya …pe… brahmattaṃ kāreyya. Ṭhānametaṃ vijjatī”ti.
an1:284.1.1: “Aṭṭhānametaṃ, bhikkhave, anavakāso yaṃ kāyaduccaritassa iṭṭho kanto manāpo vipāko nibbatteyya. Netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati.
an1:284.1.2: Ṭhānañca kho etaṃ, bhikkhave, vijjati yaṃ kāyaduccaritassa aniṭṭho akanto amanāpo vipāko nibbatteyya. Ṭhānametaṃ vijjatī”ti.
an1:285-286.1.1: “Aṭṭhānametaṃ, bhikkhave, anavakāso yaṃ vacīduccaritassa …pe… yaṃ manoduccaritassa iṭṭho kanto manāpo vipāko nibbatteyya. Netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati.
an1:285-286.1.2: Ṭhānañca kho etaṃ, bhikkhave, vijjati yaṃ manoduccaritassa aniṭṭho akanto amanāpo vipāko nibbatteyya. Ṭhānametaṃ vijjatī”ti.
an1:287.1.1: “Aṭṭhānametaṃ, bhikkhave, anavakāso yaṃ kāyasucaritassa aniṭṭho akanto amanāpo vipāko nibbatteyya. Netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati.
an1:287.1.2: Ṭhānañca kho etaṃ, bhikkhave, vijjati yaṃ kāyasucaritassa iṭṭho kanto manāpo vipāko nibbatteyya. Ṭhānametaṃ vijjatī”ti.
an1:288-289.1.1: “Aṭṭhānametaṃ, bhikkhave, anavakāso yaṃ vacīsucaritassa …pe… manosucaritassa aniṭṭho akanto amanāpo vipāko nibbatteyya. Netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati.
an1:288-289.1.2: Ṭhānañca kho etaṃ, bhikkhave, vijjati yaṃ manosucaritassa iṭṭho kanto manāpo vipāko nibbatteyya. Ṭhānametaṃ vijjatī”ti.
an1:290.1.1: “Aṭṭhānametaṃ, bhikkhave, anavakāso yaṃ kāyaduccaritasamaṅgī tannidānā tappaccayā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjeyya. Netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati.
an1:290.1.2: Ṭhānañca kho etaṃ, bhikkhave, vijjati yaṃ kāyaduccaritasamaṅgī tannidānā tappaccayā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjeyya. Ṭhānametaṃ vijjatī”ti.
an1:291-292.1.1: “Aṭṭhānametaṃ, bhikkhave, anavakāso yaṃ vacīduccaritasamaṅgī …pe… yaṃ manoduccaritasamaṅgī tannidānā tappaccayā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjeyya. Netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati.
an1:291-292.1.2: Ṭhānañca kho etaṃ, bhikkhave, vijjati yaṃ manoduccaritasamaṅgī tannidānā tappaccayā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjeyya. Ṭhānametaṃ vijjatī”ti.
an1:293.1.1: “Aṭṭhānametaṃ, bhikkhave, anavakāso yaṃ kāyasucaritasamaṅgī tannidānā tappaccayā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjeyya. Netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati.
an1:293.1.2: Ṭhānañca kho etaṃ, bhikkhave, vijjati yaṃ kāyasucaritasamaṅgī tannidānā tappaccayā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjeyya. Ṭhānametaṃ vijjatī”ti.
an1:294-295.1.1: “Aṭṭhānametaṃ, bhikkhave, anavakāso yaṃ vacīsucaritasamaṅgī …pe… yaṃ manosucaritasamaṅgī tannidānā tappaccayā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjeyya. Netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati.
an1:294-295.1.2: Ṭhānañca kho etaṃ, bhikkhave, vijjati yaṃ manosucaritasamaṅgī tannidānā tappaccayā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjeyya. Ṭhānametaṃ vijjatī”ti.
an1:296.1.1: “Ekadhammo, bhikkhave, bhāvito bahulīkato ekantanibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati.
an1:296.1.4: Ayaṃ kho, bhikkhave, ekadhammo bhāvito bahulīkato ekantanibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattatī”ti.
an1:297-305.1.1: “Ekadhammo, bhikkhave, bhāvito bahulīkato ekantanibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati.
an1:297-305.1.3: Dhammānussati …pe… saṅghānussati … sīlānussati … cāgānussati … devatānussati … ānāpānassati … maraṇassati … kāyagatāsati … upasamānussati.
an1:297-305.1.4: Ayaṃ kho, bhikkhave, ekadhammo bhāvito bahulīkato ekantanibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattatī”ti.
an1:306.1.1: “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yena anuppannā vā akusalā dhammā uppajjanti uppannā vā akusalā dhammā bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya saṃvattanti yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, micchādiṭṭhi.
an1:306.1.2: Micchādiṭṭhikassa, bhikkhave, anuppannā ceva akusalā dhammā uppajjanti uppannā ca akusalā dhammā bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya saṃvattantī”ti.
an1:307.1.1: “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yena anuppannā vā kusalā dhammā uppajjanti uppannā vā kusalā dhammā bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya saṃvattanti yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, sammādiṭṭhi.
an1:307.1.2: Sammādiṭṭhikassa, bhikkhave, anuppannā ceva kusalā dhammā uppajjanti uppannā ca kusalā dhammā bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya saṃvattantī”ti.
an1:308.1.1: “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yena anuppannā vā kusalā dhammā nuppajjanti uppannā vā kusalā dhammā parihāyanti yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, micchādiṭṭhi.
an1:308.1.2: Micchādiṭṭhikassa, bhikkhave, anuppannā ceva kusalā dhammā nuppajjanti uppannā ca kusalā dhammā parihāyantī”ti.
an1:309.1.1: “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yena anuppannā vā akusalā dhammā nuppajjanti uppannā vā akusalā dhammā parihāyanti yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, sammādiṭṭhi.
an1:309.1.2: Sammādiṭṭhikassa, bhikkhave, anuppannā ceva akusalā dhammā nuppajjanti uppannā ca akusalā dhammā parihāyantī”ti.
an1:310.1.1: “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yena anuppannā vā micchādiṭṭhi uppajjati uppannā vā micchādiṭṭhi pavaḍḍhati yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, ayonisomanasikāro.
an1:310.1.2: Ayoniso, bhikkhave, manasi karoto anuppannā ceva micchādiṭṭhi uppajjati uppannā ca micchādiṭṭhi pavaḍḍhatī”ti.
an1:311.1.1: “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yena anuppannā vā sammādiṭṭhi uppajjati uppannā vā sammādiṭṭhi pavaḍḍhati yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, yonisomanasikāro.
an1:311.1.2: Yoniso, bhikkhave, manasi karoto anuppannā ceva sammādiṭṭhi uppajjati uppannā ca sammādiṭṭhi pavaḍḍhatī”ti.
an1:312.1.1: “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yena sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ uppajjanti yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, micchādiṭṭhi.
an1:312.1.2: Micchādiṭṭhiyā, bhikkhave, samannāgatā sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ uppajjantī”ti.
an1:313.1.1: “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yena sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ uppajjanti yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, sammādiṭṭhi.
an1:313.1.2: Sammādiṭṭhiyā, bhikkhave, samannāgatā sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ uppajjantī”ti.
an1:314.1.1: “Micchādiṭṭhikassa, bhikkhave, purisapuggalassa yañceva kāyakammaṃ yathādiṭṭhi samattaṃ samādinnaṃ yañca vacīkammaṃ …pe… yañca manokammaṃ yathādiṭṭhi samattaṃ samādinnaṃ yā ca cetanā yā ca patthanā yo ca paṇidhi ye ca saṅkhārā sabbe te dhammā aniṭṭhāya akantāya amanāpāya ahitāya dukkhāya saṃvattanti.
an1:314.1.4: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, nimbabījaṃ vā kosātakibījaṃ vā tittakālābubījaṃ vā allāya pathaviyā nikkhittaṃ yañceva pathavirasaṃ upādiyati yañca āporasaṃ upādiyati sabbaṃ taṃ tittakattāya kaṭukattāya asātattāya saṃvattati.
an1:314.1.7: Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, micchādiṭṭhikassa purisapuggalassa yañceva kāyakammaṃ yathādiṭṭhi samattaṃ samādinnaṃ yañca vacīkammaṃ …pe… yañca manokammaṃ yathādiṭṭhi samattaṃ samādinnaṃ yā ca cetanā yā ca patthanā yo ca paṇidhi ye ca saṅkhārā sabbe te dhammā aniṭṭhāya akantāya amanāpāya ahitāya dukkhāya saṃvattanti.
an1:315.1.1: “Sammādiṭṭhikassa, bhikkhave, purisapuggalassa yañceva kāyakammaṃ yathādiṭṭhi samattaṃ samādinnaṃ yañca vacīkammaṃ …pe… yañca manokammaṃ yathādiṭṭhi samattaṃ samādinnaṃ yā ca cetanā yā ca patthanā yo ca paṇidhi ye ca saṅkhārā sabbe te dhammā iṭṭhāya kantāya manāpāya hitāya sukhāya saṃvattanti.
an1:315.1.4: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, ucchubījaṃ vā sālibījaṃ vā muddikābījaṃ vā allāya pathaviyā nikkhittaṃ yañceva pathavirasaṃ upādiyati yañca āporasaṃ upādiyati sabbaṃ taṃ madhurattāya sātattāya asecanakattāya saṃvattati.
an1:315.1.7: Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, sammādiṭṭhikassa purisapuggalassa yañceva kāyakammaṃ yathādiṭṭhi samattaṃ samādinnaṃ yañca vacīkammaṃ …pe… yañca manokammaṃ yathādiṭṭhi samattaṃ samādinnaṃ yā ca cetanā yā ca patthanā yo ca paṇidhi ye ca saṅkhārā sabbe te dhammā iṭṭhāya kantāya manāpāya hitāya sukhāya saṃvattanti.
an1:316.1.1: “Ekapuggalo, bhikkhave, loke uppajjamāno uppajjati bahujanaahitāya bahujanaasukhāya, bahuno janassa anatthāya ahitāya dukkhāya devamanussānaṃ.
an1:316.1.4: So bahujanaṃ saddhammā vuṭṭhāpetvā asaddhamme patiṭṭhāpeti.
an1:316.1.5: Ayaṃ kho, bhikkhave, ekapuggalo loke uppajjamāno uppajjati bahujanaahitāya bahujanaasukhāya, bahuno janassa anatthāya ahitāya dukkhāya devamanussānan”ti.
an1:317.1.1: “Ekapuggalo, bhikkhave, loke uppajjamāno uppajjati bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya, bahuno janassa atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṃ.
an1:317.1.4: So bahujanaṃ asaddhammā vuṭṭhāpetvā saddhamme patiṭṭhāpeti.
an1:317.1.5: Ayaṃ kho, bhikkhave, ekapuggalo loke uppajjamāno uppajjati bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya, bahuno janassa atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānan”ti.
an1:318.1.1: “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yaṃ evaṃ mahāsāvajjaṃ yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, micchādiṭṭhi.
an1:319.1.1: “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekapuggalampi samanupassāmi yo evaṃ bahujanaahitāya paṭipanno bahujanaasukhāya, bahuno janassa anatthāya ahitāya dukkhāya devamanussānaṃ yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, makkhali moghapuriso.
an1:319.1.2: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, nadīmukhe khippaṃ uḍḍeyya bahūnaṃ macchānaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya anayāya byasanāya;
an1:319.1.3: evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, makkhali moghapuriso manussakhippaṃ maññe loke uppanno bahūnaṃ sattānaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya anayāya byasanāyā”ti.
an1:320.1.1: “Durakkhāte, bhikkhave, dhammavinaye yo ca samādapeti yañca samādapeti yo ca samādapito tathattāya paṭipajjati sabbe te bahuṃ apuññaṃ pasavanti.
an1:321.1.1: “Svākkhāte, bhikkhave, dhammavinaye yo ca samādapeti yañca samādapeti yo ca samādapito tathattāya paṭipajjati sabbe te bahuṃ puññaṃ pasavanti.
an1:322.1.1: “Durakkhāte, bhikkhave, dhammavinaye dāyakena mattā jānitabbā, no paṭiggāhakena.
an1:323.1.1: “Svākkhāte, bhikkhave, dhammavinaye paṭiggāhakena mattā jānitabbā, no dāyakena.
an1:324.1.1: “Durakkhāte, bhikkhave, dhammavinaye yo āraddhavīriyo so dukkhaṃ viharati.
an1:325.1.1: “Svākkhāte, bhikkhave, dhammavinaye yo kusīto so dukkhaṃ viharati.
an1:326.1.1: “Durakkhāte, bhikkhave, dhammavinaye yo kusīto so sukhaṃ viharati.
an1:327.1.1: “Svākkhāte, bhikkhave, dhammavinaye yo āraddhavīriyo so sukhaṃ viharati.
an1:328.1.2: evamevaṃ kho ahaṃ, bhikkhave, appamattakampi bhavaṃ na vaṇṇemi, antamaso accharāsaṅghātamattampi”.
an1:329.1.1: “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, appamattakampi muttaṃ duggandhaṃ hoti … appamattakopi kheḷo duggandho hoti … appamattakopi pubbo duggandho hoti … appamattakampi lohitaṃ duggandhaṃ hoti;
an1:329.1.2: evamevaṃ kho ahaṃ, bhikkhave, appamattakampi bhavaṃ na vaṇṇemi, antamaso accharāsaṅghātamattampi”.
an1:333.1.1: “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, appamattakaṃ imasmiṃ jambudīpe ārāmarāmaṇeyyakaṃ vanarāmaṇeyyakaṃ bhūmirāmaṇeyyakaṃ pokkharaṇirāmaṇeyyakaṃ;
an1:333.1.2: atha kho etadeva bahutaraṃ yadidaṃ ukkūlavikūlaṃ nadīviduggaṃ khāṇukaṇṭakaṭṭhānaṃ pabbatavisamaṃ;
an1:333.1.3: evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye thalajā, atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye odakā.
an1:334.1.1: … Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye manussesu paccājāyanti;
an1:334.1.2: atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye aññatra manussehi paccājāyanti.
an1:334.2.1: … Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye majjhimesu janapadesu paccājāyanti;
an1:334.2.2: atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye paccantimesu janapadesu paccājāyanti aviññātāresu milakkhesu.
an1:335.1.1: … Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye paññavanto ajaḷā aneḷamūgā paṭibalā subhāsitadubbhāsitassa atthamaññātuṃ;
an1:335.1.2: atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye duppaññā jaḷā eḷamūgā na paṭibalā subhāsitadubbhāsitassa atthamaññātuṃ.
an1:336.1.1: … Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye ariyena paññācakkhunā samannāgatā;
an1:336.1.2: atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye avijjāgatā sammūḷhā.
an1:337.1.1: … Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye labhanti tathāgataṃ dassanāya;
an1:337.1.2: atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye na labhanti tathāgataṃ dassanāya.
an1:338.1.1: … Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye labhanti tathāgatappaveditaṃ dhammavinayaṃ savanāya;
an1:338.1.2: atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye na labhanti tathāgatappaveditaṃ dhammavinayaṃ savanāya.
an1:339.1.1: … Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye sutvā dhammaṃ dhārenti;
an1:339.1.2: atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye sutvā dhammaṃ na dhārenti.
an1:340.1.1: … Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye dhātānaṃ dhammānaṃ atthaṃ upaparikkhanti;
an1:340.1.2: atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye dhātānaṃ dhammānaṃ atthaṃ na upaparikkhanti.
an1:341.1.1: … Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye atthamaññāya dhammamaññāya dhammānudhammaṃ paṭipajjanti;
an1:341.1.2: atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye atthamaññāya dhammamaññāya dhammānudhammaṃ na paṭipajjanti.
an1:342.1.1: … Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye saṃvejaniyesu ṭhānesu saṃvijjanti;
an1:342.1.2: atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye saṃvejaniyesu ṭhānesu na saṃvijjanti.
an1:343.1.1: … Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye saṃviggā yoniso padahanti;
an1:343.1.2: atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye saṃviggā yoniso na padahanti.
an1:344.1.1: … Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye vavassaggārammaṇaṃ karitvā labhanti samādhiṃ labhanti cittassekaggataṃ;
an1:344.1.2: atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye vavassaggārammaṇaṃ karitvā na labhanti samādhiṃ na labhanti cittassekaggataṃ.
an1:345.1.1: … Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye annaggarasaggānaṃ lābhino;
an1:345.1.2: atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye annaggarasaggānaṃ na lābhino, uñchena kapālābhatena yāpenti.
an1:346.1.1: … Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye attharasassa dhammarasassa vimuttirasassa lābhino;
an1:346.1.2: atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye attharasassa dhammarasassa vimuttirasassa na lābhino.
an1:347-349.1.1: “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, appamattakaṃ imasmiṃ jambudīpe ārāmarāmaṇeyyakaṃ vanarāmaṇeyyakaṃ bhūmirāmaṇeyyakaṃ pokkharaṇirāmaṇeyyakaṃ;
an1:347-349.1.2: atha kho etadeva bahutaraṃ yadidaṃ ukkūlavikūlaṃ nadīviduggaṃ khāṇukaṇṭakaṭṭhānaṃ pabbatavisamaṃ.
an1:347-349.1.3: Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye manussā cutā manussesu paccājāyanti, atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye manussā cutā niraye paccājāyanti …pe… tiracchānayoniyā paccājāyanti …pe… pettivisaye paccājāyanti”.
an1:350-352.1.1: … Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye manussā cutā devesu paccājāyanti;
an1:350-352.1.2: atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye manussā cutā niraye paccājāyanti … tiracchānayoniyā paccājāyanti … pettivisaye paccājāyanti.
an1:353-355.1.1: … Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye devā cutā devesu paccājāyanti;
an1:353-355.1.2: atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye devā cutā niraye paccājāyanti … tiracchānayoniyā paccājāyanti … pettivisaye paccājāyanti.
an1:356-358.1.1: … Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye devā cutā manussesu paccājāyanti;
an1:356-358.1.2: atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye devā cutā niraye paccājāyanti … tiracchānayoniyā paccājāyanti … pettivisaye paccājāyanti.
an1:359-361.1.1: … Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye nirayā cutā manussesu paccājāyanti;
an1:359-361.1.2: atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye nirayā cutā niraye paccājāyanti … tiracchānayoniyā paccājāyanti … pettivisaye paccājāyanti.
an1:362-364.1.1: … Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye nirayā cutā devesu paccājāyanti;
an1:362-364.1.2: atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye nirayā cutā niraye paccājāyanti … tiracchānayoniyā paccājāyanti … pettivisaye paccājāyanti.
an1:365-367.1.1: … Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye tiracchānayoniyā cutā manussesu paccājāyanti;
an1:365-367.1.2: atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye tiracchānayoniyā cutā niraye paccājāyanti … tiracchānayoniyā paccājāyanti … pettivisaye paccājāyanti.
an1:368-370.1.1: … Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye tiracchānayoniyā cutā devesu paccājāyanti;
an1:368-370.1.2: atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye tiracchānayoniyā cutā niraye paccājāyanti … tiracchānayoniyā paccājāyanti … pettivisaye paccājāyanti.
an1:371-373.1.1: … Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye pettivisayā cutā manussesu paccājāyanti;
an1:371-373.1.2: atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye pettivisayā cutā niraye paccājāyanti … tiracchānayoniyā paccājāyanti … pettivisaye paccājāyanti.
an1:374-377.1.1: … Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye pettivisayā cutā devesu paccājāyanti;
an1:374-377.1.2: atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye pettivisayā cutā niraye paccājāyanti … tiracchānayoniyā paccājāyanti … pettivisaye paccājāyan”ti.
an1:378-393.1.1: “Addhamidaṃ, bhikkhave, lābhānaṃ yadidaṃ āraññikattaṃ …pe… piṇḍapātikattaṃ … paṃsukūlikattaṃ … tecīvarikattaṃ … dhammakathikattaṃ … vinayadharattaṃ … bāhusaccaṃ … thāvareyyaṃ … ākappasampadā … parivārasampadā … mahāparivāratā … kolaputti … vaṇṇapokkharatā … kalyāṇavākkaraṇatā … appicchatā … appābādhatā”ti.
an1:394.1.1: “Accharāsaṅghātamattampi ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti, ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave:
an1:394.1.2: ‘bhikkhu arittajjhāno viharati, satthusāsanakaro ovādapatikaro, amoghaṃ raṭṭhapiṇḍaṃ bhuñjati’.
an1:394.1.3: Ko pana vādo ye naṃ bahulīkarontī”ti.
an1:395-401.1.1: “Accharāsaṅghātamattampi ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti …pe… tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti …pe… catutthaṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti …pe… mettaṃ cetovimuttiṃ bhāveti …pe… karuṇaṃ cetovimuttiṃ bhāveti …pe… muditaṃ cetovimuttiṃ bhāveti …pe… upekkhaṃ cetovimuttiṃ bhāveti …pe….
an1:402-405.1.1: Kāye kāyānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ …pe…
an1:402-405.1.4: dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ.
an1:406-409.1.1: Anuppannānaṃ pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ anuppādāya chandaṃ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṃ ārabhati cittaṃ paggaṇhāti padahati;
an1:406-409.1.2: uppannānaṃ pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ pahānāya chandaṃ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṃ ārabhati cittaṃ paggaṇhāti padahati.
an1:406-409.1.3: Anuppannānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ uppādāya chandaṃ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṃ ārabhati cittaṃ paggaṇhāti padahati;
an1:406-409.1.4: uppannānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ ṭhitiyā asammosāya bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā chandaṃ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṃ ārabhati cittaṃ paggaṇhāti padahati.
an1:410-413.1.1: Chandasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṃ iddhipādaṃ bhāveti … vīriyasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṃ iddhipādaṃ bhāveti … cittasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṃ iddhipādaṃ bhāveti … vīmaṃsāsamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṃ iddhipādaṃ bhāveti ….
an1:414-418.1.1: Saddhindriyaṃ bhāveti … vīriyindriyaṃ bhāveti … satindriyaṃ bhāveti … samādhindriyaṃ bhāveti … paññindriyaṃ bhāveti ….
an1:419-423.1.1: Saddhābalaṃ bhāveti … vīriyabalaṃ bhāveti … satibalaṃ bhāveti … samādhibalaṃ bhāveti … paññābalaṃ bhāveti ….
an1:424-430.1.1: Satisambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāveti … dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāveti … vīriyasambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāveti … pītisambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāveti … passaddhisambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāveti … samādhisambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāveti … upekkhāsambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāveti ….
an1:431-438.1.1: Sammādiṭṭhiṃ bhāveti … sammāsaṅkappaṃ bhāveti … sammāvācaṃ bhāveti … sammākammantaṃ bhāveti … sammāājīvaṃ bhāveti … sammāvāyāmaṃ bhāveti … sammāsatiṃ bhāveti … sammāsamādhiṃ bhāveti ….
an1:439-446.1.1: Ajjhattaṃ rūpasaññī bahiddhā rūpāni passati parittāni suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇāni.
an1:439-446.1.5: … ajjhattaṃ rūpasaññī bahiddhā rūpāni passati appamāṇāni suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇāni.
an1:439-446.1.9: … ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññī bahiddhā rūpāni passati parittāni suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇāni.
an1:439-446.1.13: … ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññī bahiddhā rūpāni passati appamāṇāni suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇāni.
an1:439-446.1.17: … ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññī bahiddhā rūpāni passati nīlāni nīlavaṇṇāni nīlanidassanāni nīlanibhāsāni.
an1:439-446.1.21: … ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññī bahiddhā rūpāni passati pītāni pītavaṇṇāni pītanidassanāni pītanibhāsāni.
an1:439-446.1.25: … ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññī bahiddhā rūpāni passati lohitakāni lohitakavaṇṇāni lohitakanidassanāni lohitakanibhāsāni.
an1:439-446.1.29: … ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññī bahiddhā rūpāni passati odātāni odātavaṇṇāni odātanidassanāni odātanibhāsāni.
an1:447-454.1.1: Rūpī rūpāni passati … ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññī bahiddhā rūpāni passati … subhanteva adhimutto hoti … sabbaso rūpasaññānaṃ samatikkamā paṭighasaññānaṃ atthaṅgamā nānattasaññānaṃ amanasikārā ananto ākāsoti ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ upasampajja viharati … sabbaso ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ samatikkamma anantaṃ viññāṇanti viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ upasampajja viharati … sabbaso viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ samatikkamma natthi kiñcīti ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ upasampajja viharati … sabbaso ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ samatikkamma nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ upasampajja viharati … sabbaso nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ samatikkamma saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ upasampajja viharati ….
an1:455-464.1.1: Pathavikasiṇaṃ bhāveti … āpokasiṇaṃ bhāveti … tejokasiṇaṃ bhāveti … vāyokasiṇaṃ bhāveti … nīlakasiṇaṃ bhāveti … pītakasiṇaṃ bhāveti … lohitakasiṇaṃ bhāveti … odātakasiṇaṃ bhāveti … ākāsakasiṇaṃ bhāveti … viññāṇakasiṇaṃ bhāveti …. ()
an1:465-474.1.1: Asubhasaññaṃ bhāveti … maraṇasaññaṃ bhāveti … āhāre paṭikūlasaññaṃ bhāveti … sabbaloke anabhiratisaññaṃ bhāveti … aniccasaññaṃ bhāveti … anicce dukkhasaññaṃ bhāveti … dukkhe anattasaññaṃ bhāveti … pahānasaññaṃ bhāveti … virāgasaññaṃ bhāveti … nirodhasaññaṃ bhāveti ….
an1:475-484.1.1: Aniccasaññaṃ bhāveti … anattasaññaṃ bhāveti … maraṇasaññaṃ bhāveti … āhāre paṭikūlasaññaṃ bhāveti … sabbaloke anabhiratisaññaṃ bhāveti … aṭṭhikasaññaṃ bhāveti … puḷavakasaññaṃ bhāveti … vinīlakasaññaṃ bhāveti … vicchiddakasaññaṃ bhāveti … uddhumātakasaññaṃ bhāveti ….
an1:485-494.1.1: Buddhānussatiṃ bhāveti … dhammānussatiṃ bhāveti … saṅghānussatiṃ bhāveti … sīlānussatiṃ bhāveti … cāgānussatiṃ bhāveti … devatānussatiṃ bhāveti … ānāpānassatiṃ bhāveti … maraṇassatiṃ bhāveti … kāyagatāsatiṃ bhāveti … upasamānussatiṃ bhāveti ….
an1:495-534.1.1: Paṭhamajjhānasahagataṃ saddhindriyaṃ bhāveti … vīriyindriyaṃ bhāveti … satindriyaṃ bhāveti … samādhindriyaṃ bhāveti … paññindriyaṃ bhāveti … saddhābalaṃ bhāveti … vīriyabalaṃ bhāveti … satibalaṃ bhāveti … samādhibalaṃ bhāveti … paññābalaṃ bhāveti ….
an1:535-574.1.1: Dutiyajjhānasahagataṃ …pe… tatiyajjhānasahagataṃ …pe… catutthajjhānasahagataṃ …pe… mettāsahagataṃ …pe… karuṇāsahagataṃ …pe… muditāsahagataṃ …pe… upekkhāsahagataṃ saddhindriyaṃ bhāveti … vīriyindriyaṃ bhāveti … satindriyaṃ bhāveti … samādhindriyaṃ bhāveti … paññindriyaṃ bhāveti … saddhābalaṃ bhāveti … vīriyabalaṃ bhāveti … satibalaṃ bhāveti … samādhibalaṃ bhāveti … paññābalaṃ bhāveti.
an1:535-574.1.3: ‘bhikkhu arittajjhāno viharati satthusāsanakaro ovādapatikaro, amoghaṃ raṭṭhapiṇḍaṃ bhuñjati’.
an1:535-574.1.4: Ko pana vādo ye naṃ bahulīkarontī”ti.
an1:575.1.1: “Yassa kassaci, bhikkhave, mahāsamuddo cetasā phuṭo antogadhā tassa kunnadiyo yā kāci samuddaṅgamā;
an1:575.1.2: evamevaṃ, bhikkhave, yassa kassaci kāyagatā sati bhāvitā bahulīkatā antogadhā tassa kusalā dhammā ye keci vijjābhāgiyā”ti.
an1:576-582.1.1: “Ekadhammo, bhikkhave, bhāvito bahulīkato mahato saṃvegāya saṃvattati … mahato atthāya saṃvattati … mahato yogakkhemāya saṃvattati … satisampajaññāya saṃvattati … ñāṇadassanappaṭilābhāya saṃvattati … diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārāya saṃvattati … vijjāvimuttiphalasacchikiriyāya saṃvattati.
an1:576-582.1.4: Ayaṃ kho, bhikkhave, ekadhammo bhāvito bahulīkato mahato saṃvegāya saṃvattati … mahato atthāya saṃvattati … mahato yogakkhemāya saṃvattati … satisampajaññāya saṃvattati … ñāṇadassanappaṭilābhāya saṃvattati … diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārāya saṃvattati … vijjāvimuttiphalasacchikiriyāya saṃvattatī”ti.
an1:583.1.1: “Ekadhamme, bhikkhave, bhāvite bahulīkate kāyopi passambhati, cittampi passambhati, vitakkavicārāpi vūpasammanti, kevalāpi vijjābhāgiyā dhammā bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchanti.
an1:583.1.4: Imasmiṃ kho, bhikkhave, ekadhamme bhāvite bahulīkate kāyopi passambhati, cittampi passambhati, vitakkavicārāpi vūpasammanti, kevalāpi vijjābhāgiyā dhammā bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchantī”ti.
an1:584.1.1: “Ekadhamme, bhikkhave, bhāvite bahulīkate anuppannā ceva akusalā dhammā nuppajjanti, uppannā ca akusalā dhammā pahīyanti.
an1:584.1.4: Imasmiṃ kho, bhikkhave, ekadhamme bhāvite bahulīkate anuppannā ceva akusalā dhammā nuppajjanti, uppannā ca akusalā dhammā pahīyantī”ti.
an1:585.1.1: “Ekadhamme, bhikkhave, bhāvite bahulīkate anuppannā ceva kusalā dhammā uppajjanti, uppannā ca kusalā dhammā bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya saṃvattanti.
an1:585.1.4: Imasmiṃ kho, bhikkhave, ekadhamme bhāvite bahulīkate anuppannā ceva kusalā dhammā uppajjanti, uppannā ca kusalā dhammā bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya saṃvattantī”ti.
an1:586.1.1: “Ekadhamme, bhikkhave, bhāvite bahulīkate avijjā pahīyati, vijjā uppajjati, asmimāno pahīyati, anusayā samugghātaṃ gacchanti, saṃyojanā pahīyanti.
an1:586.1.4: Imasmiṃ kho, bhikkhave, ekadhamme bhāvite bahulīkate avijjā pahīyati, vijjā uppajjati, asmimāno pahīyati, anusayā samugghātaṃ gacchanti, saṃyojanā pahīyantī”ti.
an1:587-588.1.1: “Ekadhammo, bhikkhave, bhāvito bahulīkato paññāpabhedāya saṃvattati … anupādāparinibbānāya saṃvattati.
an1:587-588.1.4: Ayaṃ kho, bhikkhave, ekadhammo bhāvito bahulīkato paññāpabhedāya saṃvattati … anupādāparinibbānāya saṃvattatī”ti.
an1:589-591.1.1: “Ekadhamme, bhikkhave, bhāvite bahulīkate anekadhātupaṭivedho hoti … nānādhātupaṭivedho hoti … anekadhātupaṭisambhidā hoti.
an1:589-591.1.4: Imasmiṃ kho, bhikkhave, ekadhamme bhāvite bahulīkate anekadhātupaṭivedho hoti … nānādhātupaṭivedho hoti … anekadhātupaṭisambhidā hotī”ti.
an1:592-595.1.1: “Ekadhammo, bhikkhave, bhāvito bahulīkato sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya saṃvattati … sakadāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya saṃvattati … anāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya saṃvattati … arahattaphalasacchikiriyāya saṃvattati.
an1:592-595.1.4: Ayaṃ kho, bhikkhave, ekadhammo bhāvito bahulīkato sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya saṃvattati … sakadāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya saṃvattati … anāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya saṃvattati … arahattaphalasacchikiriyāya saṃvattatī”ti.
an1:596-615.1.1: “Ekadhammo, bhikkhave, bhāvito bahulīkato paññāpaṭilābhāya saṃvattati … paññāvuddhiyā saṃvattati … paññāvepullāya saṃvattati … mahāpaññatāya saṃvattati … puthupaññatāya saṃvattati … vipulapaññatāya saṃvattati … gambhīrapaññatāya saṃvattati … asāmantapaññatāya saṃvattati … bhūripaññatāya saṃvattati … paññābāhullāya saṃvattati … sīghapaññatāya saṃvattati … lahupaññatāya saṃvattati … hāsapaññatāya saṃvattati … javanapaññatāya saṃvattati … tikkhapaññatāya saṃvattati … nibbedhikapaññatāya saṃvattati.
an1:596-615.1.4: Ayaṃ kho, bhikkhave, ekadhammo bhāvito bahulīkato paññāpaṭilābhāya saṃvattati … paññāvuddhiyā saṃvattati … paññāvepullāya saṃvattati … mahāpaññatāya saṃvattati … puthupaññatāya saṃvattati … vipulapaññatāya saṃvattati … gambhīrapaññatāya saṃvattati … asāmantapaññatāya saṃvattati … bhūripaññatāya saṃvattati … paññābāhullāya saṃvattati … sīghapaññatāya saṃvattati … lahupaññatāya saṃvattati … hāsapaññatāya saṃvattati … javanapaññatāya saṃvattati … tikkhapaññatāya saṃvattati … nibbedhikapaññatāya saṃvattatī”ti.
an1:616.1.1: “Amataṃ te, bhikkhave, na paribhuñjanti ye kāyagatāsatiṃ na paribhuñjanti.
an1:616.1.2: Amataṃ te, bhikkhave, paribhuñjanti ye kāyagatāsatiṃ paribhuñjantī”ti.
an1:617.1.1: “Amataṃ tesaṃ, bhikkhave, aparibhuttaṃ yesaṃ kāyagatāsati aparibhuttā.
an1:617.1.2: Amataṃ tesaṃ, bhikkhave, paribhuttaṃ yesaṃ kāyagatāsati paribhuttā”ti.
an1:618.1.1: “Amataṃ tesaṃ, bhikkhave, parihīnaṃ yesaṃ kāyagatāsati parihīnā.
an1:618.1.2: Amataṃ tesaṃ, bhikkhave, aparihīnaṃ yesaṃ kāyagatāsati aparihīnā”ti.
an1:619.1.1: “Amataṃ tesaṃ, bhikkhave, viraddhaṃ yesaṃ kāyagatāsati viraddhā.
an1:619.1.2: Amataṃ tesaṃ, bhikkhave, āraddhaṃ yesaṃ kāyagatāsati āraddhā”ti.
an1:620.1.1: “Amataṃ te, bhikkhave, pamādiṃsu ye kāyagatāsatiṃ pamādiṃsu.
an1:620.1.2: Amataṃ te, bhikkhave, na pamādiṃsu ye kāyagatāsatiṃ na pamādiṃsu”.
an1:621.1.1: “Amataṃ tesaṃ, bhikkhave, pamuṭṭhaṃ yesaṃ kāyagatāsati pamuṭṭhā.
an1:621.1.2: Amataṃ tesaṃ, bhikkhave, appamuṭṭhaṃ yesaṃ kāyagatāsati appamuṭṭhā”ti.
an1:622.1.1: “Amataṃ tesaṃ, bhikkhave, anāsevitaṃ yesaṃ kāyagatāsati anāsevitā.
an1:622.1.2: Amataṃ tesaṃ, bhikkhave, āsevitaṃ yesaṃ kāyagatāsati āsevitā”ti.
an1:623.1.1: “Amataṃ tesaṃ, bhikkhave, abhāvitaṃ yesaṃ kāyagatāsati abhāvitā.
an1:623.1.2: Amataṃ tesaṃ, bhikkhave, bhāvitaṃ yesaṃ kāyagatāsati bhāvitā”ti.
an1:624.1.1: “Amataṃ tesaṃ, bhikkhave, abahulīkataṃ yesaṃ kāyagatāsati abahulīkatā.
an1:624.1.2: Amataṃ tesaṃ, bhikkhave, bahulīkataṃ yesaṃ kāyagatāsati bahulīkatā”ti.
an1:625.1.1: “Amataṃ tesaṃ, bhikkhave, anabhiññātaṃ yesaṃ kāyagatāsati anabhiññātā.
an1:625.1.2: Amataṃ tesaṃ, bhikkhave, abhiññātaṃ yesaṃ kāyagatāsati abhiññātā”ti.
an1:626.1.1: “Amataṃ tesaṃ, bhikkhave, apariññātaṃ yesaṃ kāyagatāsati apariññātā.
an1:626.1.2: Amataṃ tesaṃ, bhikkhave, pariññātaṃ yesaṃ kāyagatāsati pariññātā”ti.
an1:627.1.1: “Amataṃ tesaṃ, bhikkhave, asacchikataṃ yesaṃ kāyagatāsati asacchikatā.
an1:627.1.2: Amataṃ tesaṃ, bhikkhave, sacchikataṃ yesaṃ kāyagatāsati sacchikatā”ti.
an1:627.2.2: Attamanā te bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinandunti.
